about_the_game:
The soundtrack of Slime-san is made out of an all-star ensemble of chiptune masters. Engross yourself into the wondrous world of chiptune by listening to these highly addictive beats.

Track list:

1. Mighty Mama (Ear)Worm - Richard Gould - 3:58
2. Mixtapeworm - Adhesive Wombat - 0:55
3. Slumptown Shuffle - Mischa Perella - 1:47
4. Slimy Success - FantomenK - 1:45
5. Wormhole - Adhesive Wombat - 1:39
6. Hit the Slime Note - Meganeko - 1:08
7. Instrumental Intestine - Kommisar - 1:33
8. Organ Donor - Mischa Perella - 1:50
9. Akiha-Worma - Meganeko - 1:13
10. Brain Beats - Tiasu - 1:31
11. Old Worm and the Sea - Lumena-tan - 1:32
12. Acid Trip - Mischa Perella - 1:57
13. Heart Trebbles - Kubbi - 2:25
14. Woodwinds - Adhesive Wombat - 1:50
15. Birdie Breakdown - Carl Clark - 1:04
16. Uvula’s Groovula - Inverse Phase - 1:49
17. Red Shadow’s Revenge - Saad Akter Ali - 2:14
18. Slime Crisis - Meganeko - 1:48
19. Tequila and (S)lime - Michael Miller - 2:04


Contributing artists:

Richard Gould
Adhesive Wombat
Mischa Perella
FantomenK
Meganeko
Kommisar
Tiasu
Lumena-tan
Kubbi
Carl Clark
Inverse Phase
Saad Akter Ali
Michael Miller
